body_html:
#14107 discusses 1.4's extra GPU memory usage compared to older versions, which seems to be the same issue that you're facing.

For help with making adjustments for your specific case, Stack Overflow is our preferred location to ask questions. Thanks!

body:
#14107 discusses 1.4's extra GPU memory usage compared to older versions, which seems to be the same issue that you're facing.

For help with making adjustments for your specific case, [Stack Overflow](http://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/tensorflow) is our preferred location to ask questions. Thanks!
